name: Classic - Normal
desc: Defend against the zombies and defeat the Ultimate zombies.

name: Classic - Hardcore
desc: This secret is deeply buried in a hidden manual, located in the Underground lab.

name: Classic - Endless
desc: The zombies' attacks are relentless. Find the right time to retreat.

name: Undead Siege - Casual
desc: It's surprising that the giant vortex of Aether has brought us some help. Let's see what these rookies got. -- Dempsey

name: Undead Siege - Hard
desc: Teleportation failed. Richtofen seems aware that this is not as simple as it appears. We must fight together to survive the floods of tireless undead. -- Nikolai

name: Undead Siege - Nightmare
desc: We traced the Aether energy to its source, and Richtofen finally revealed his new plan. This time we will take the fight to them and put an end to the chaos here. -- Nikolai
